/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene from a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a driver's viewpoint on the road, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The road is teeming with vehicles, including cars and trucks, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. On either side of the road, lush green trees and bushes can be seen, offering a touch of nature amidst the city's concrete structures. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
